scripts.start:cli: npm run build:happ && cross-env ADMIN_PORT=$(port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "npm run start:happ" "npm run dev:cli"
scripts.dev:cli: npm run build -w @holochain-playground/cli-client && concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @holochain-playground/cli-client" "sleep 5 && npm start -w @holochain-playground/cli ws://localhost:${ADMIN_PORT}"
scripts.start:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate tests/happ/workdir/forum.happ --run=8888 network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.demo:publish: npm run build -ws && npm run publish -w @holochain-playground/demo
